**This complainant already has a signature on file with us. Below is the latest email request:

ATTN: Google, Inc.
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA, [private], USA
Fax:[private]

FROM: [private]
travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
[private]
[private],
Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private], P.R.C.
Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]
E-mail: [private]@gmail.com

SUBJ: Copyright Infringement
DATE: September 28, 2007

Dear Google, Inc.

1. I, the webmaster of www.travelchinaguide.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website.

The offender is www.chinayak.com . They copied 11 pages of contents and 11 images with our water mark from our website. So I am here to ask for your investigation and removal of the following infringing pages and images:

(1)Search Query "Khamsum Zilnon is a very eye-catching building behind the main gate."
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020209025353/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/norbulingka.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinayak.com/tibet/html/20067216491-1.html

(2)Search Query "Barkhor chinayak.com" see "More results from www.chinayak.com"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20010605192957/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/barkhor.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinayak.com/tibet/html/20065218258-1.html (The last four paragraphs copied our content.)

(3) Search Query "Yarlong Tsangpo River chinayak.com"
our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020815200448/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/nyingchi/yarlong.htm
